sentences.english: Then comes a banner from 1968, which looks bloodstained.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的旗子是1968年，看上去有些血跡斑斑。

sentences.english: There it is, all blood-stained, on the desk, as a testimony of the crime.
sentences.chinese: 血跡斑斑的，在那張桌子上，充作物證。

sentences.english: The right arm and hip were abraded and bloody from scraping across pavement.
sentences.chinese: 右胳膊和臀部被道路擦傷，血跡斑斑。

sentences.english: The blood-stained glove told of the bandit's crime.
sentences.chinese: 血跡斑斑的手套就是匪徒的罪證。

sentences.english: The Russians also took fragments of Hitler's bloodstained sofa.
sentences.chinese: 此外，他們還發現了希特勒那血跡斑斑的沙發殘骸。

sentences.english: Sully peered into the blood-splattered cockpit.
sentences.chinese: 薩倫伯格察看了血跡斑斑的駕駛艙。
